name: Bravely Default: Flying Fairy - HD Remaster
storyline: Without warning, the Great Chasm opened a hole in the world. Tiz is the sole survivor of a village swallowed whole by the chasm. In the depths of his despair, he encounters a young vestal named Agnès. Together they set off on a journey with the goal of closing the chasm and freeing the crystals swallowed by darkness... They set off, entirely unaware of the significance of that goal.
summary: BRAVELY DEFAULT, the first title in the BRAVELY series, comes to Nintendo Switch 2, remastered in high definition. Discover the origins of the classic Brave and Default battle system alongside new and enhanced features, including all new mini-games! The story of light and shadow that never fades is reborn!
